title: Poster, 2010-21-19, 1983–1984
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: On mustard brown, the face of a clock with no hands, functioning as the top part of a skull, with the lower part--the jaw--rainbow-colored, appearing to snarl. At lower right is the inscription: "Catherine DENEUVE / David BOWIE / i Susan / SARANDON / w filmie / ZAGADKA / NIESMIERTELNOSCI / rezyseria: Tony SCOTT / produkcja: Richard Shepherd Company dla MGA/UA, 1983".
